articles.title: FBI Conducted Potentially Millions of Searches of Americans’ Data Last Year, Report Says - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: U.S. officials’ disclosure of warrantless searches that took place as part of national-security probes is likely to stoke longstanding privacy concerns in Congress.

articles.title: Islamic State 'Beatle' guilty of murdering journalists and aid workers faces a lifetime of near-solitary confinement - ABC News
articles.description: A member of an Islamic State militant group nicknamed "The Beatles" that beheaded American hostages is due to face a US judge on Friday who will determine whether to subject him to a lifetime of near-solitary confinement.
